EmailTemplate.name: AP Email reminder for Track lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Outstanding Track Leads - ({!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName})
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName}, This email has been automatically generated by Salesforce.com to indicate that the Track Lead Status on the following lead ({!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}) has been changed for more than 30 days. You can update the lead by clicking on the following link: ({!Lead.Link}) Please follow the lead management process to change the lead status to 'End' when you have completed processing the lead or ‘Convert’ the potential lead to account if needed. If you have any questions please contact the DIMC AP Key User: Name: Korapat (Kate) Sutthiprapa Email: Korapat.Sutthiprapa@dupont.com Please note that the DIMC AP Key User will receive notification if this lead continues to be outstanding Regards, DuPont Inquiry Management Centre Asia Pacific
